attributes.action: Make fuel prices affordable for the average family in the UK
attributes.additional_details: Because fuel prices in the UK have gone to a unaffordable price and the average family in the UK are strugging to live without having to worry if they can afford fuel
attributes.background: Lower fuel prices in the UK so the average family can afford to use there car on a daily basis and lower the price per litre of fuel

rejection.details:
The Government is not directly responsible for the price of fuel, but we have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Suspend VAT on road fuels to reduce fuel costs: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610567

Remove duty on motor fuel completely: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/613908

Set up an independent regulator to monitor and regulate vehicle fuel pricing: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/605282
